content:
From: Daniel Matichuk <Daniel.Matichuk@nicta.com.au>
Thanks for that, Lars.

The inconsistent bolding is actually a due to conflation of outer vs. inner syntax in the match method parser, and
is somewhat non-trivial to fix. Various hacks could be done to work around this, but itâ€™s fairly low priority.

-Dan
